title: Q3 Combine Sentences Constructed Response
prompt: Write a sentence that combines the sentences without changing their meanings. Write your answer in the box.
description:
Read these sentences.

Beverly usually arrived fifteen minutes early for work. She enjoyed having a few minutes to sip her coffee before beginning her morning meetings.
feedback: One possible correct answer is: “Beverly usually arrived fifteen minutes early for work because she enjoyed having a few minutes to sip her coffee before beginning her morning meetings.” This response uses the word “because” to establish the relationship between the two sentences.
